items.typeLine: Careful Hallowed Hybrid Flask of Sealing
explicitMods:
Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 8 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 8 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
fracturedMods: 122% more Recovery if used while on Low Life
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 74% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that reserve life or mana to create auras around you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 19% increased Aura effect
Supported Skills have no Reservation

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Your Non-Blessing Skills which Reserve Mana are Disabled while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby allies deal 16 to 248 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 21% more Spell Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Spends a portion of your mana to grant a buff that takes some of the damage from hits for you until depleted. The buff grants added lightning damage based on the amount of mana spent by this skill. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds
20% increased Skill Effect Duration
Spends 64% of current Mana

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
Buff grants Added Lightning Damage equal to 14% of Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Annihilating Light
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: 60% reduced Elemental Resistances
Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills
flavourText: There is no force more destructive in the heavens
than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Activates every 1 second while Attached
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range

Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have a 100% chance to grant a Power Charge when slain
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +1.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +49% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies grant 600 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 80 Mana when Killed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Place a Frost Shield that drains your energy shield for one second or until you run out, gaining stages while this drain occurs. The Frost Shield takes some damage from hits in place of you and allies while in its area. Enemies in the area are Chilled. You can only have one Frost Shield active at once.
explicitMods: Base duration is 10.00 seconds
20% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies in Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
60% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies outside Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
You gain +0.38% to Spell Critical Strike Chance per Stage while in Area
Frost Shield has 910 maximum Life per Stage
Maximum 4 Stages
Gains 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while you are losing Energy Shield
You lose 730 Energy Shield per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.
explicitMods: Base duration is 12.00 seconds
Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 400 Mana while in Area
Enemies in Area deal 19% less Damage while at maximum Stages
Maximum 4 Stages
Buff grants 7 to 141 Added Lightning Damage per Stage
Minimum 1 second between Stages

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. explicitMods: Deals 344 to 516 Physical Damage
Base duration is 5.00 seconds
Pulses every 0.40 seconds
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 39% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
